text: This week, we began our Pfizer #COVID19 vaccinations at our UNC Health #Hillsborough campus. Dr. David Wohl was the first person to get the #vaccine. We also vaccinated Kammikia Barnes, CMA & Capt. Michael Harper. Jordan Wallace, PharmD, administered the 1st vaccine to Dr. Wohl. https://t.co/afcNzPB7au
